author: sboag
msg: Only notify every 10 events or so (this number needs to be controleable by an application).
When the parse thread is done use the join() function to block until the transform thread is complete.

author: sboag
msg: In getFirstChild, use hasChildNodes instead of getChildCount, which solves the last incrementality bug that I know of.

author: sboag
msg: Pass m_doc directly from getOwnerDocument, instead of getDocumentImpl.

author: sboag
msg: Pass one less parameter to avt.evaluate.
